entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.6°C

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
